column1:

column1:
Polar pesticides (atrazine,
carbendazim,

desethylterbutylazine, diu-
ron, S-metolachlor,

diclofenac,

100, BDE 153, BDE 154);

Method for the determina-

column1:
Multiclass pharmaceuticals
(analgesics/anti-
inﬂammatories, antibiotics,
lipid regulators, β-blockers,
antiepileptic/psychiatrics
ulcer healings, diuretics,
hormones and bronchodi-
lators),
lifestyle products
